description.value: Your words echo with soothing and convincing power. When you attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Gather Information], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression], make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Request], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Lie], you can spend a Mythic Point to attempt the check at mythic proficiency.
